name: Marmio, were is my Apple?
description:
Controls

WASD - Shift for sprint and G to feed.

Info

Made in the "Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3", basically I and my friend basically wanted to try and do art so we joined and made this beautiful triple-A game ;) We definitely didn't have any clue on what we were doing :D

never the less we are proud and it was super fun :P
